content.body: I'm trying to use `using` declarations in a real project -- I like the feature but oh I hate so much that we decided to require a binding name
content.formatted_body: I'm trying to use using declarations in a real project -- I like the feature but oh I hate so much that we decided to require a binding name

using _1 = this.withState("inType", true);
        // Temporarily remove a JSX parsing context, which makes us scan different tokens.
        using _2 = this.withState("context", this.state.context.slice(0, 1));

Yes, it had using void

did the proposal have anonymous `using` before and the we removed it? Or am I hallucinating that like a LLM

content.body: IMO we should figure out how to make _ work well for this purpose. Nicolo had some good ideas about semantics.
